scripts._build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run tex && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts._pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages_pull
scripts._push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages_push
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify_dist; npm run browserify_test
scripts.coverage: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls
scripts.cp: npm run cp_dist; npm run cp_package.json
scripts.gh-pages_push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages_pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in src test; do npm run lint_$x; done
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run _push
scripts.tex: npm run tex_display; npm run tex_inline
scripts.tex_display: ls gh-pages/tex-snippets/display/*.tex | while read texfile; do cat $texfile | katex --display-mode > gh-pages/_includes/display/$(basename ${texfile%.tex}).html; done
scripts.tex_inline: ls gh-pages/tex-snippets/inline/*.tex | while read texfile; do cat $texfile | katex > gh-pages/_includes/inline/$(basename ${texfile%.tex}).html; done
